resources.string: Welcome to Quiet Hours! You will only see this screen once. The background service has been started.
Simply add "_silent" or "_vibrate" inside the Description field of a calendar event, and all phone calls and text messages will be silenced accordingly for the duration of the calendar event.
Please contact me if you have feedback: sturmen@outlook.com
This application is open source. You can find the source code for Quiet Hours here: https://github.com/sturmen/Quiet-Hours
